Articles.Content:
So, this post will be my 500th. That means I'm halfway to 1K, which is a LOT of posts. I'm glad I've stuck around, from .23-1.0.

When did you guys reach your 500th post?

I have no idea. Almost at 1,500 though!

Congrats! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
One and a half years ago? Dunno.

> 
> One and a half years ago? Dunno.

I know a certain someone who joined this year and has over 2.2K posts... Maybe he remembers?
Apparently I have the 144th highest post count on this forum...Where is everyone?

Congrats! It's always fun to centennially mark your post counts.

Almost there!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-11T15:29:50Z" title="05/11/2015 03:29  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 11, 2015</time> by Columbia**
Thank you all very much for your support ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Should I make one of these for 1,500? I didn't make one for anything before....or should I wait for 2k... ?

> 
> Apparently I have the 144th highest post count on this forum...Where is everyone?

I'm 46th.

Dang....This forum needs more people! I know of other forums where multiple members have 20k+ up to 30k posts!

EDIT: 142 now.

How do you find what your post ranking is?

And congrats!

> 
> How do you find what your post ranking is?
> And congrats!

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/memberlist.php](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/memberlist.php)

Go here and keep going until you find yourself. Then at the bottom of the page, will be thenumber of the top and bottom index. Count and find your number.

Congratulations! 

Also i should have made a thread for my 1000th... Why did you have to give me the idea too late!!!!!
Congrats! I got to mine late 2012 I believe....
I might make one for 3k, definetly for 5,000. If I get there, 10,000.
Took me over two years to get to 500.

> 
> [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/memberlist.php](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/memberlist.php)
> Go here and keep going until you find yourself. Then at the bottom of the page, will be thenumber of the top and bottom index. Count and find your number.

Actually, first you have to click the "post count" section at the top. Then you scroll through. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Post counts? Whazzat? (Yeah yeah, I know. I just never see them since 99% of the time I'm on mobile.)

Anyway... Congrats on typing a bunch 'o words and pressing "Post Thread/Reply" 500 times. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Woah man........

![KlSHwZ6.png](http://i.imgur.com/KlSHwZ6.png)

even worse than the post count, look at his avatar. How many sides are on a die? that's right, **6**. and look at the right and top side. Add that together, and you get **6**. And even worse, look at the outline of the dice. How many sides does the outline have? that's right, **6!!!!!!!**

**666** 666 Illuminati confirmed! Everyone run!
I'm almost at 1,000, and I have no idea when I hit 500. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Ok, I think I'm 1264 as of before this post.

We're this list?

- - - Updated - - -

Why are there so many names that start with and are cloud George's

Post count? Pfft. Look at [this guy](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100793-90-v0-9-1-Kerbal-Live-Feed-Interstellar-Flight-Inc-%28FORK%29?p=1720578#post1720578). He joined 4 years ago but has 10 posts. Tell me how that's not a higher achievement than having 500 posts after only a few months.

At 247 posts, I am ranked at 1356 (by the list), tied with rather a number of people whom I shall promptly pass as I hit this little button at the bottom of my screen.

@Ethan: The list was linked earlier, but [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/memberlist.php?&pp=30&order=desc&sort=posts) it is again with the settings to go by post count.

Wow. 10 posts in several years. I am impressed incredibly. The reserve that that member must have, is astounding.

I think I got past 10 posts in my first day here, talking about the Orion test flight. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

*NOW RANKED AT 1351*

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-12T03:07:32Z" title="05/12/2015 03:07  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 12, 2015</time> by Newt**
  
updates
I'm 73rd in the most posts list. I really don't get why post count matters so much though...
